```{r}
conn = conn=DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
```

```{sql connection=conn}
CREATE TABLE recipes (
  id INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  UNIQUE (name)
);
```

```{sql connection=conn}
INSERT INTO recipes 
    (id, name) 
VALUES 
    (1,"Tacos"),
    (2,"Tomato Soup"),
    (3,"Grilled Cheese");
``` 

```{sql connection=conn}
select * from recipes
```
